greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of primitive inequivalent (up to Pi/2 rotation) nonsquare sublattices of square lattice of index n.
link: John S. Rutherford, Sublattice enumeration. IV. Equivalence classes of plane sublattices by parent Patterson symmetry and colour lattice group type, Acta Cryst. (2009). A65, 156-163. [See Table 4.]
xref: Cf. A000089 (primitive square sublattices), A002654 (all square sublattices), A145392 (all sublattices), A001615, A304182.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 25 2009
ext: New name and more terms from _Andrey Zabolotskiy_, May 09 2018
